metadata.title: USN-6792-1 -- Flask-Security vulnerability
metadata.description: Naom Moshe discovered that Flask-Security incorrectly validated URLs. An attacker could use this issue to redirect users to arbitrary URLs.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6792-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python3-flask-security - 1.7.5-2ubuntu0.18.04.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
